addfacettoobject.name: AddFacetToObject
addfacettoobject.description: Grants permission to add a new Facet to an object

applyschema.name: ApplySchema
applyschema.description: Grants permission to copy input published schema into Directory with same name and version as that of published schema

attachobject.name: AttachObject
attachobject.description: Grants permission to attach an existing object to another existing object

attachpolicy.name: AttachPolicy
attachpolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a policy object to any other object

attachtoindex.name: AttachToIndex
attachtoindex.description: Grants permission to attach the specified object to the specified index

attachtypedlink.name: AttachTypedLink
attachtypedlink.description: Grants permission to attach a typed link b/w a source & target object reference

batchread.name: BatchRead
batchread.description: Grants permission to perform all the read operations in a batch. Each individual operation inside BatchRead needs to be granted permissions explicitly

batchwrite.name: BatchWrite
batchwrite.description: Grants permission to perform all the write operations in a batch. Each individual operation inside BatchWrite needs to be granted permissions explicitly

createdirectory.name: CreateDirectory
createdirectory.description: Grants permission to create a Directory by copying the published schema into the directory

createfacet.name: CreateFacet
createfacet.description: Grants permission to create a new Facet in a schema

createindex.name: CreateIndex
createindex.description: Grants permission to create an index object

createobject.name: CreateObject
createobject.description: Grants permission to create an object in a Directory

createschema.name: CreateSchema
createschema.description: Grants permission to create a new schema in a development state

createtypedlinkfacet.name: CreateTypedLinkFacet
createtypedlinkfacet.description: Grants permission to create a new Typed Link facet in a schema

deletedirectory.name: DeleteDirectory
deletedirectory.description: Grants permission to delete a directory. Only disabled directories can be deleted

deletefacet.name: DeleteFacet
deletefacet.description: Grants permission to delete a given Facet. All attributes and Rules associated with the facet will be deleted

deleteobject.name: DeleteObject
deleteobject.description: Grants permission to delete an object and its associated attributes

deleteschema.name: DeleteSchema
deleteschema.description: Grants permission to delete a given schema

deletetypedlinkfacet.name: DeleteTypedLinkFacet
deletetypedlinkfacet.description: Grants permission to delete a given TypedLink Facet. All attributes and Rules associated with the facet will be deleted

detachfromindex.name: DetachFromIndex
detachfromindex.description: Grants permission to detach the specified object from the specified index

detachobject.name: DetachObject
detachobject.description: Grants permission to detach a given object from the parent object

detachpolicy.name: DetachPolicy
detachpolicy.description: Grants permission to detach a policy from an object

detachtypedlink.name: DetachTypedLink
detachtypedlink.description: Grants permission to detach a given typed link b/w given source and target object reference

disabledirectory.name: DisableDirectory
disabledirectory.description: Grants permission to disable the specified directory

enabledirectory.name: EnableDirectory
enabledirectory.description: Grants permission to enable the specified directory

getappliedschemaversion.name: GetAppliedSchemaVersion
getappliedschemaversion.description: Grants permission to return current applied schema version ARN, including the minor version in use

getdirectory.name: GetDirectory
getdirectory.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata about a directory

getfacet.name: GetFacet
getfacet.description: Grants permission to get details of the Facet, such as Facet Name, Attributes, Rules, or ObjectType

getlinkattributes.name: GetLinkAttributes
getlinkattributes.description: Grants permission to retrieve attributes that are associated with a typed link

getobjectattributes.name: GetObjectAttributes
getobjectattributes.description: Grants permission to retrieve attributes within a facet that are associated with an object

getobjectinformation.name: GetObjectInformation
getobjectinformation.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata about an object

getschemaasjson.name: GetSchemaAsJson
getschemaasjson.description: Grants permission to retrieve a JSON representation of the schema

gettypedlinkfacetinformation.name: GetTypedLinkFacetInformation
gettypedlinkfacetinformation.description: Grants permission to return identity attributes order information associated with a given typed link facet

listappliedschemaarns.name: ListAppliedSchemaArns
listappliedschemaarns.description: Grants permission to list schemas applied to a directory

listattachedindices.name: ListAttachedIndices
listattachedindices.description: Grants permission to list indices attached to an object

listdevelopmentschemaarns.name: ListDevelopmentSchemaArns
listdevelopmentschemaarns.description: Grants permission to retrieve the ARNs of schemas in the development state

listdirectories.name: ListDirectories
listdirectories.description: Grants permission to list directories created within an account

listfacetattributes.name: ListFacetAttributes
listfacetattributes.description: Grants permission to retrieve attributes attached to the facet

listfacetnames.name: ListFacetNames
listfacetnames.description: Grants permission to retrieve the names of facets that exist in a schema

listincomingtypedlinks.name: ListIncomingTypedLinks
listincomingtypedlinks.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all incoming TypedLinks for a given object

listindex.name: ListIndex
listindex.description: Grants permission to list objects attached to the specified index

listmanagedschemaarns.name: ListManagedSchemaArns
listmanagedschemaarns.description: Grants permission to list the major version families of each managed schema. If a major version ARN is provided as SchemaArn, the minor version revisions in that family are listed instead

listobjectattributes.name: ListObjectAttributes
listobjectattributes.description: Grants permission to list all attributes associated with an object

listobjectchildren.name: ListObjectChildren
listobjectchildren.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of child objects associated with a given object

listobjectparentpaths.name: ListObjectParentPaths
listobjectparentpaths.description: Grants permission to retrieve all available parent paths for any object type such as node, leaf node, policy node, and index node objects

listobjectparents.name: ListObjectParents
listobjectparents.description: Grants permission to list parent objects associated with a given object in pagination fashion

listobjectpolicies.name: ListObjectPolicies
listobjectpolicies.description: Grants permission to return policies attached to an object in pagination fashion

listoutgoingtypedlinks.name: ListOutgoingTypedLinks
listoutgoingtypedlinks.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all outgoing TypedLinks for a given object

listpolicyattachments.name: ListPolicyAttachments
listpolicyattachments.description: Grants permission to return all of the ObjectIdentifiers to which a given policy is attached

listpublishedschemaarns.name: ListPublishedSchemaArns
listpublishedschemaarns.description: Grants permission to retrieve published schema ARNs

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to return tags for a resource

listtypedlinkfacetattributes.name: ListTypedLinkFacetAttributes
listtypedlinkfacetattributes.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of attributes associated with typed link facet

listtypedlinkfacetnames.name: ListTypedLinkFacetNames
listtypedlinkfacetnames.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of typed link facet names that exist in a schema

lookuppolicy.name: LookupPolicy
lookuppolicy.description: Grants permission to list all policies from the root of the Directory to the object specified

publishschema.name: PublishSchema
publishschema.description: Grants permission to publish a development schema with a version

putschemafromjson.name: PutSchemaFromJson
putschemafromjson.description: Grants permission to update a schema using JSON upload. Only available for development schemas

removefacetfromobject.name: RemoveFacetFromObject
removefacetfromobject.description: Grants permission to remove the specified facet from the specified object

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

updatefacet.name: UpdateFacet
updatefacet.description: Grants permission to add/update/delete existing Attributes, Rules, or ObjectType of a Facet

updatelinkattributes.name: UpdateLinkAttributes
updatelinkattributes.description: Grants permission to update a given typed link's attributes. Attributes to be updated must not contribute to the typed link's identity, as defined by its IdentityAttributeOrder

updateobjectattributes.name: UpdateObjectAttributes
updateobjectattributes.description: Grants permission to update a given object's attributes

updateschema.name: UpdateSchema
updateschema.description: Grants permission to update the schema name with a new name

updatetypedlinkfacet.name: UpdateTypedLinkFacet
updatetypedlinkfacet.description: Grants permission to add/update/delete existing Attributes, Rules, identity attribute order of a TypedLink Facet

upgradeappliedschema.name: UpgradeAppliedSchema
upgradeappliedschema.description: Grants permission to upgrade a single directory in-place using the PublishedSchemaArn with schema updates found in MinorVersion. Backwards-compatible minor version upgrades are instantaneously available for readers on all objects in the directory

upgradepublishedschema.name: UpgradePublishedSchema
upgradepublishedschema.description: Grants permission to upgrade a published schema under a new minor version revision using the current contents of DevelopmentSchemaArn
